com.oopuniversity.kafkapoc.config

Class ConfigListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oopuniversity.kafkapoc.config.ConfigListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.kafka.listener.ConsumerSeekAware

    @Component
public class ConfigListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.kafka.listener.ConsumerSeekAware
    ConfigListener will listen to a Kafka topic in order to build and maintain the configuration information for the module

        @KafkaListener(topics="config")
public void processMessage(java.lang.String content)

      • registerSeekCallback

        public void registerSeekCallback(org.springframework.kafka.listener.ConsumerSeekAware.ConsumerSeekCallback callback)
        Register the callback to use when seeking at some arbitrary time. When used with a ConcurrentMessageListenerContainer or the same listener instance in multiple containers listeners should store the callback in a ThreadLocal.
        Specified by:
        registerSeekCallback in interface org.springframework.kafka.listener.ConsumerSeekAware
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback.

      • onPartitionsAssigned

        public void onPartitionsAssigned(java.util.Map<org.apache.kafka.common.TopicPartition,java.lang.Long> assignments,
                                 org.springframework.kafka.listener.ConsumerSeekAware.ConsumerSeekCallback callback)
        When using group management, called when partition assignments change.
        Specified by:
        onPartitionsAssigned in interface org.springframework.kafka.listener.ConsumerSeekAware
        Parameters:
        assignments - the new assignments and their current offsets.
        callback - the callback to perform an initial seek after assignment.

      • onIdleContainer

        public void onIdleContainer(java.util.Map<org.apache.kafka.common.TopicPartition,java.lang.Long> assignments,
                            org.springframework.kafka.listener.ConsumerSeekAware.ConsumerSeekCallback callback)
        If the container is configured to emit idle container events, this method is called when the container idle event is emitted - allowing a seek operation.
        Specified by:
        onIdleContainer in interface org.springframework.kafka.listener.ConsumerSeekAware
        Parameters:
        assignments - the new assignments and their current offsets.
        callback - the callback to perform a seek.
